comment.name: Thomas Omaley
comment.text: The most delicious burger I have ever tasted. Great service!

comment.name: Sara Pattick
comment.text: It has quality, a good price, a great taste, and it's served as you decide. What else you want?

comment.name: Daniel Vinck
comment.text: As a food taster I can only say one thing 10/10

comment.name: Tobias Notradame
comment.text: Came all the way from Notradame to taste these deicuous hamburgers. (Im now planning to live over here :) )
